DOC.brief_summary: The GLOBAL study international multi-center , prospective study design enroll 10,000 consecutive eligible subject clinically refer coronary CT angiography assessment suspect coronary artery disease ( CAD ) . The purpose study perform extensive biomarker analysis atherosclerosis patient phenotyped use advanced imaging modality atherosclerosis .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Ages 1890 2 . Caucasian NonHispanic NonLatino origin 3 . Referral coronary CT angiography evaluate presence CAD 4 . The patient sign appropriate Institutional Review Board approve Informed Consent Form 1 . Immunosuppressive immunomodulatory therapy include dose systemic corticosteroid precede 30 day ( except steroid administer premedication prior contrast administration CT scan within 24 hour ) . 2 . Chemotherapy precede year 3 . Major surgery precede 2 month 4 . Blood blood product transfusion precede 2 month 5 . Subjects coronary CT angiography contraindicate per institutional standard care 6 . Subjects previous coronary arterial revascularization ( PCI CABG ) 7 . Subjects atrial fibrillation/flutter frequent irregular rapid heart rhythm , occur within past 3 month 8 . Subjects pacemaker implantable cardioverterdefibrillator implant 9 . Active congestive heart failure presence know nonischemic cardiomyopathy 10 . Known genetic disorder atherosclerosis , lipid lipoprotein metabolism
